mapper.select: SELECT cashbook_id cashbookId, cashbook_kind cashbookKind, category_name categoryName, cashbook_price cashbookPrice, cashbook_content cashbookContent, cashbook_date cashbookDate FROM cashbook ORDER BY cashbook_date DESC, cashbook_id DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT cashbook_kind cashbookKind, SUM(cashbook_price) cashbookPrice, DAY(cashbook_date) day FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{currentYear} AND MONTH(cashbook_date) = #{currentMonth} GROUP BY DAY(cashbook_date), cashbook_kind

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(cashbook_date, '%Y.%m') AS "날짜", SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "수입", SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "지출", SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END) - (case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "합계" FROM cashbook GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(cashbook_date, '%Y.%m') ORDER BY cashbook_date DESC LIMIT 0, 3

SELECT cashbook_id cashbookId, cashbook_kind cashbookKind, category_name categoryName, cashbook_price cashbookPrice, cashbook_content cashbookContent, cashbook_date cashbookDate FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_id = #{cashbookId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cashbook( cashbook_kind, category_name, cashbook_price, cashbook_content, cashbook_date, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{cashbookKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashbookPrice}, #{cashbookContent}, #{cashbookDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE cashbook SET cashbook_kind = #{cashbookKind}, category_name = #{categoryName}, cashbook_price = #{cashbookPrice}, cashbook_content = #{cashbookContent}, cashbook_date = #{cashbookDate}, update_date = NOW() WHERE cashbook_id = #{cashbookId}
